documents.document: @AndrewPaulWood Or a postage stamp, unless you want to write in really big letters.
@mmfa Ye gods, @DrDavidDuke 's tweets are dribbling down his leg. He might wanna have a box of tissues handy next time.
@bbcdoctorwho As devastated as I am by this, can he go back to being Malcolm Tucker? The world needs his reckons more than ever. @Aiannucci
@piersmorgan For that to be funny, Trump would have to be doing good along with the bad, or at least have signaled he will. Care to cite?
@Daniel_Hatch Just read it & the earlier one. The scariest part is he's underestimated the speed of escalation. It's moving like an ep of 24
@mizjwilliams No that was Oscar Wilde.
@LachlanForsyth You're becoming NZ's Louis Theroux, except he gets to stay in a brothel while you get dumped in a creek & lost in the bush.
@MikePerfectHosk Burned a pile of money while broadcasting the conversation of builders working next to a female only gym & a WINZ.
@Anthonywodillon And what "focus" would not include charges against the officer who threw her to the floor? It's a specious argument.
@Anthonywodillon @mnxmoosi @mc_sassyj Deon absolutely deserves to be punished. He probably will be. So so police. They probably won't be.
@mnxmoosi @mc_sassyj @Anthonywodillon Then Aboriginal women* shdnt be imprisoned unless police willing to support families (*or ANY women)
@mnxmoosi @mc_sassyj @Anthonywodillon Police should not be punished unless their accusers are prepared to take their place. Really?!

@AndrewPaulWood Yay, everyone is trying to outdo one another on irony. How unique. I hope you have the 1812 Overture cued for 7am tomorrow?

@timbyrnes89 You appear to doubt the efficacy of his tinfoil hat.
